CustomField.description: Ranking of Innos for the choosen channel
CustomField.formula:
/* Define the priority of the Product for the right channel - The channel is the BU Target for Budget Assortment and the BU source for others - Be careful the customer could choose to have different names for the BU Channel eg HMSM... you have to adapt the formula */
CASE(if( Assortment_type__c = 'Budget', Assortment_BU__r.BU_Target__r.Name , Assortment_BU__r.BU_source__r.Name ), 'HM', text(Product__r.RankingHyper__c) , 'SM', text(Product__r.RankingSuper__c) , 'Proxi', text( Product__r.RankingConvenience__c ) , 'Drive', text( Product__r.RankingDrive__c ) , 'LAD', text( Product__r.RankingWeb__c ) , null)
CustomField.label: Inno Ranking
